**Live Product Demos**: Create live streaming sessions on platforms like Facebook or Instagram where customers can see and interact with your products in real-time. You could have experts demonstrating how to use or wear the products, answering questions, and offering discounts for those who watch live. **Confidence Score**: 0.9

**Personalized Recommendations Engine**: Develop an AI-driven recommendation system that uses customer data (like browsing history, purchase history, etc.) to suggest personalized product recommendations. This can significantly increase the chances of a customer finding something they're interested in, leading to more sales. **Confidence Score**: 0.85

**Community Engagement Program**: Build a community around your brand where customers can interact, share experiences, and provide feedback. You could host contests, forums, or exclusive events for members. This not only builds brand loyalty but also provides valuable insights into customer preferences. **Confidence Score**: 0.9

**Subscription Model with Flexibility**: Offer subscription boxes containing a mix of products. Allow customers to customize their boxes by choosing the types of items they want, how often they receive them, and even swap items out. This model can attract loyal customers who appreciate the convenience and personalization. **Confidence Score**: 0.88

**Virtual Try-On Technology**: Implement virtual reality (VR) or augmented reality (AR) features that allow customers to try on clothing or view furniture in their own space before purchasing. This can greatly enhance the shopping experience and reduce return rates due to size or style issues. **Confidence Score**: 0.9
